entry.title: data visualization
entry.content:
currently working on data visualize with charts and graphs, which leading me to d3.js is a JavaScript library for manipulating documents based on data.

accidently found out an ode to this wonderful series Cardcaptor Sakura. The outer rings (outside the lines) focus on all 50 chapters. Such as which Clow cards were captured in each chapter or the smaller groups of circles showing the main colors present in each chapter‚Äôs cover art, all practically a piece of art. The inner ring (on the inside of the lines) concentrates on the main characters and their connections. click read more to have a close look of the data visualization.



from : Nadieh Bremer - Fifty chapters of adorable cuteness Cardcaptor Sakura
entry.summary:
currently working on data visualize with charts and graphs, which leading me to d3.js is a JavaScript library for manipulating documents based on data.

accidently found out an ode to this wonderful series Cardcaptor Sakura. The outer rings (outside the lines) focus on all 50 chapters. Such as which Clow cards were captured in each chapter or the smaller groups of circles showing the main colors present in each chapter‚Äôs cover art, all practically a piece of art. The inner ring (on the inside of the lines) concentrates on the main characters and their connections. click read more to have a close look of the data visualization.

entry.title: React Start-kit
entry.content:
for a quick start up of React + Webpack project react-seed, simply checkout my github project with your star ‚≠ê would be really appreciated.

React Webpack StartUp

Folder Structure

After creation, your project should look like this:

For the project to build, these files must exist with exact filenames:

  • dist/index.html is the page template;
  • src/index.js is the JavaScript entry point.

You can delete or rename the other files.

You may create subdirectories inside src. For faster rebuilds, only files inside src are processed by Webpack.

You need to put any JS and CSS files inside src, otherwise Webpack won‚Äôt see them.

Only files inside dist can be used from dist/index.html.

Read instructions below for using assets from JavaScript and HTML.

You can, however, create more top-level directories.

They will not be included in the production build so you can use them for things like documentation.
for example JsDoc and just exclude them in your _gitignore file

Available Scripts

In the project directory, you can run:

npm start

Runs the app in the development mode.

Open http://localhost:8080 to view it in the browser.

The page will reload if you make edits.

You will also see any lint errors in the console.

npm test

Launches the test runner in the interactive watch mode.

See the section about running tests for more information.

npm run build

Builds the app for production to the build folder.

It correctly bundles React in production mode and optimizes the build for the best performance.

The build is minified and the filenames include the hashes.

Your app is ready to be deployed!
entry.summary:
for a quick start up of React + Webpack project react-seed, simply checkout my github project with your star ‚≠ê would be really appreciated.

React Webpack StartUp

Folder Structure

After creation, your project should look like this:

For the project to build, these files must exist with exact filenames:

  • dist/index.html is the page template;
  • src/index.js is the JavaScript entry point.

You can delete or rename the other files.

You may create subdirectories inside src. For faster rebuilds, only files inside src are processed by Webpack.

You need to put any JS and CSS files inside src, otherwise Webpack won‚Äôt see them.

Only files inside dist can be used from dist/index.html.

Read instructions below for using assets from JavaScript and HTML.

You can, however, create more top-level directories.

They will not be included in the production build so you can use them for things like documentation.
for example JsDoc and just exclude them in your _gitignore file

entry.title: Flex-box CSS
entry.content:
Instead of trying üé® CSS Box model, which structuring the basis layout with display + position + float. Now we are going to have a full review of the new w3c Working Draft for layout solution : Flexbox.

üí° Flexbox layout is most appropriate for small-scale layouts

browser support

before starting flex, please make sure that your project in targeted in the right device.
checkout the following image and checkout the details by clicking the following link Flexbox support

flex basis

Basically, items will be laid out following either the main axis (from main-start to main-end) or the cross axis (from cross-start to cross-end).

  • main axis - The main axis of a flex container is the primary axis along which flex items are laid out. Beware, it is not necessarily horizontal; it depends on the flex-direction property (see below).
  • main-start | main-end - The flex items are placed within the container starting from main-start and going to main-end.
  • main size - A flex item‚Äôs width or height, whichever is in the main dimension, is the item‚Äôs main size. The flex item‚Äôs main size property is either the ‚Äòwidth‚Äô or ‚Äòheight‚Äô property, whichever is in the main dimension.
  • cross axis - The axis perpendicular to the main axis is called the cross axis. Its direction depends on the main axis direction.
  • cross-start | cross-end - Flex lines are filled with items and placed into the container starting on the cross-start side of the flex container and going toward the cross-end side.
  • cross size - The width or height of a flex item, whichever is in the cross dimension, is the item‚Äôs cross size. The cross size property is whichever of ‚Äòwidth‚Äô or ‚Äòheight‚Äô that is in the cross dimension.

1. Usage

Basic Usage of flex layout by displaying flex in your flex container, and inline-flex also work with a inline container case.

2. Container

3. Item

Demo


1

2

5

entry.summary: Instead of trying üé® CSS Box model, which structuring the basis layout with display + position + float. Now we are going to have a full review of the new w3c Working Draft for layout solution : Flexbox.

entry.title: Codes for Language
entry.content:
For developing language IOS 639 üåê setting reminder, read more to checkout the ISO 639 Standard language setting. Globified language names for your filename cases. for example zh-CN.json and with i18n or some other language outlet, simply build up your Multiple language app.

Recording for my daily Japanese learning, try the Duolingo, which helping me a lot to remember the basis Japanese words, in which I really recommend you for starting what ever language. Simply select your language by the landing page.
